ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Back to good stuff, LOOT! and Levels!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Got bored last night and went down to the King s Room in Runnyeye to reminisce a bit (remeber when BI was the rage?).  There  happened to be a 50+ necro in
ygData.messageBody:
> Hmm I haven't messed with mystic shielding much.

Got bored last night and went down to the King's Room in Runnyeye to
reminisce a bit (remeber when BI was the rage?). There happened to be a
50+ necro in the room camping for Borxx (she needed the lens and nerves for
a quest). Well sure enough, BOrxx popped, and I had had the good sense to
mem Mystic Shielding. Out of about 7 or 8 casts on me, Borxx only got one
to stick :o)

and that's the totallity of my Mystic Shield experience ;o)~

-=B=-
41.something
The Rathe
